Value: Magmatic Resources Limited engages in the development and exploration of mineral properties in Australia. It focuses on gold, copper, nickel, and base metal deposits. The company holds a 100% interest in the Myall, the Parkes, and the Wellington North projects located in the East Lachlan, New South Wales. It also holds a 100% interest in the Mt Venn project that is located in the east of Laverton in Western Australia; and the Yamarna Gold Project, which is located in the Yamarna Greenstone Belt of Western Australia. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Nedlands, Australia.
